mapper.sql:
WHERE A.EDU_DIV_CD = #{condDivCd} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' /* 기관 삭제여부 */ AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' /* 교육프로그램 삭제여부 */ AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' /* 교육프로그램 사용여부 */ AND A.JC_AGREE_STS_CD = 'JAS0000000001' AND (A.RECRUMT_STS_CD = 'RSC0000000002' OR A.RECRUMT_STS_CD = 'RSC0000000003')
AND A.EDU_TRNNG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condText},'%')
AND EXISTS ( SELECT G.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ FROM CPES_TEACH_ADDR G WHERE G.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ AND G.ADDR_CD = #{condAreaCd} )

ORDER BY
A.BKMK_CNT DESC
A.VIEW_CNT DESC
A.REG_DT DESC
mapper.select:
/*eduTrnng.selectEduTrnng*/ SELECT A.INSTT_SEQ , A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ , IFNULL(A.EDU_TRNNG_NM, '') AS EDU_TRNNG_NM , A.ISCO_CD , FN_GET_ISCO_NM(ISCO_CD, #{langCd}) AS ISCO_NM , A.TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD', A.TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_NM , C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD', C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD, #{langCd}) AS SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_NM , C.HIGH_GENRL_EDU_CORS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('HIGH_GENRL_EDU_CORS_CD', C.HIGH_GENRL_EDU_CORS_CD, #{langCd}) AS HIGH_GENRL_EDU_CORS_NM , A.RECRUMT_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('RECRUMT_STS_CD', A.RECRUMT_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS RECRUMT_STS_NM , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_END_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.EDU_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS EDU_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.EDU_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS EDU_END_DT , A.EDU_DURA , A.VIEW_CNT , A.BKMK_CNT , C.TEACH_HOUR_WEEK , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('PC_TYPE_CD', C.PROGRAM_CORS_TYPE_CD, #{langCd}) AS PROGRAM_CORS_TYPE_NM , FN_GET_ISCED_NM(C.MAJOR_1DEPTH_CD, #{langCd}) AS MAJOR_1DEPTH_NM , FN_GET_ISCED_NM(C.MAJOR_2DEPTH_CD, #{langCd}) AS MAJOR_2DEPTH_NM , A.FREE_PAID_YN , A.TUITION , A.PROGRAM_CERT_NUM , C.EDU_TARGET , C.ADMSS_CRITERIA , C.CONTENT , C.ENROL_METHOD , A.EDU_TRNNG_KEYWORD , B.USER_SEQ , A.JC_AGREE_STS_CD , C.EDU_TRNNG_SUB_SEQ , B.INSTT_OWNER_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('INSTT_OWNER_CD', B.INSTT_OWNER_CD, #{langCd}) AS INSTT_OWNER_NM , B.INSTT_TYPE_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('INSTT_TYPE_CD', B.INSTT_TYPE_CD, #{langCd}) AS INSTT_TYPE_NM , B.INSTT_ADDR_DTL , B.INSTT_WEBSITE , B.BKMK_CNT AS INSTT_BKMK_CNT , FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, #{condCateCd}, A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ) AS BKMK_SEQ , FN_GET_INSTT_NM(B.INSTT_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS INSTT_NM , B.INSTT_OFFICE_TEL , A.ADDR_FULL_NM , A.EDU_TRNNG_KEYWORD , C.GOOGLE_MAP_LINK FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON A.INSTT_SEQ = B.INSTT_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ WHERE A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = #{condSeq} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'

/*eduTrnng.selectEduTrnngListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON A.INSTT_SEQ = B.INSTT_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ

/*eduTrnng.selectEduTrnngList*/ SELECT A.INSTT_SEQ , A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ , IFNULL(A.EDU_TRNNG_NM, '') AS EDU_TRNNG_NM , A.RECRUMT_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('RECRUMT_STS_CD', A.RECRUMT_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS RECRUMT_STS_NM , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_END_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.EDU_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS EDU_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.EDU_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS EDU_END_DT , A.VIEW_CNT , A.BKMK_CNT , A.TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD', A.TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_NM , A.FREE_PAID_YN , A.TUITION , A.PROGRAM_CERT_NUM , B.USER_SEQ , C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD', C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD, #{langCd}) AS SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_NM , A.JC_AGREE_STS_CD , ( SELECT BKMK_SEQ FROM CPES_BKMK F WHERE F.CATE_CD = #{condCateCd} AND F.TABLE_KEY_SEQ = A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ AND F.USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq} ) AS BKMK_SEQ , IFNULL(FN_GET_ADDR_NM_BY_EDU_TRNNG(A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ, #{langCd}), '') AS ADDR_NM , FN_GET_NEW_YN(A.REG_DT) AS NEW_YN FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON A.INSTT_SEQ = B.INSTT_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

/*eduTrnng.selectEduTrnngFreeListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON A.INSTT_SEQ = B.INSTT_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LI.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ, GROUP_CONCAT(LI.ADDR_CD ORDER BY LI.ADDR_CD ASC SEPARATOR ',') AS ADDR_CD FROM CPES_TEACH_ADDR LI GROUP BY LI.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ) D ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = D.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ

/*eduTrnng.selectEduTrnngFreeList*/ SELECT A.INSTT_SEQ , A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ , IFNULL(A.EDU_TRNNG_NM, '') AS EDU_TRNNG_NM , A.RECRUMT_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('RECRUMT_STS_CD', A.RECRUMT_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS RECRUMT_STS_NM , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_END_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.EDU_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS EDU_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.EDU_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS EDU_END_DT , A.VIEW_CNT , A.BKMK_CNT , A.TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD', A.TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_NM , CASE WHEN A.TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD = 'NDC0000000001' THEN 'training' WHEN A.TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD = 'NDC0000000002' THEN 'scholarship' ELSE '' END AS TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CLASS , A.FREE_PAID_YN , A.TUITION , A.PROGRAM_CERT_NUM , B.USER_SEQ , C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD , IFNULL(FN_GET_COMMON_NM('SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD', C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD, #{langCd}), '') AS SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_NM , A.JC_AGREE_STS_CD , IFNULL(FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, #{condCateCd}, A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ), '') AS BKMK_SEQ , IFNULL(FN_GET_ADDR_NM_BY_EDU_TRNNG(A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ, #{langCd}), '') AS ADDR_NM , FN_GET_NEW_YN(A.REG_DT) AS NEW_YN , FN_GET_FILE_PATH(B.INSTT_LOGO_FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS FILE_PATH , D.ADDR_CD FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON A.INSTT_SEQ = B.INSTT_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LI.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ, GROUP_CONCAT(LI.ADDR_CD ORDER BY LI.ADDR_CD ASC SEPARATOR ',') AS ADDR_CD FROM CPES_TEACH_ADDR LI GROUP BY LI.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ) D ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = D.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

/*eduTrnng.selectEduTrnngNeaListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON A.INSTT_SEQ = B.INSTT_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LI.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ, GROUP_CONCAT(LI.ADDR_CD ORDER BY LI.ADDR_CD ASC SEPARATOR ',') AS ADDR_CD FROM CPES_TEACH_ADDR LI GROUP BY LI.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ) D ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = D.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ

/*eduTrnng.selectEduTrnngNeaList*/ SELECT A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ , IFNULL(A.EDU_TRNNG_NM, '') AS EDU_TRNNG_NM , A.RECRUMT_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('RECRUMT_STS_CD', A.RECRUMT_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS RECRUMT_STS_NM , A.VIEW_CNT , A.BKMK_CNT , IFNULL(FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, #{condCateCd}, A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ), '') AS BKMK_SEQ , IFNULL(FN_GET_ADDR_NM_BY_EDU_TRNNG(A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ, #{langCd}), '') AS ADDR_NM , FN_GET_NEW_YN(A.REG_DT) AS NEW_YN , C.TEACHER_NM_1 , C.RECRUMT_MEMB , C.TEACH_DT , CONCAT(C.TEACH_BGN_HOUR, ':', C.TEACH_BGN_MINUTE, C.TEACH_BGN_AMPM) AS TEACH_BGN_TIME , CONCAT(C.TEACH_END_HOUR, ':', C.TEACH_END_MINUTE, C.TEACH_END_AMPM) AS TEACH_END_TIME FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON A.INSTT_SEQ = B.INSTT_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LI.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ, GROUP_CONCAT(LI.ADDR_CD ORDER BY LI.ADDR_CD ASC SEPARATOR ',') AS ADDR_CD FROM CPES_TEACH_ADDR LI GROUP BY LI.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ) D ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = D.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

/*eduTrnng.selectEduTrnngSoftSkillListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON A.INSTT_SEQ = B.INSTT_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ

/*eduTrnng.selectEduTrnngSoftSkillList*/ SELECT A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ , IFNULL(A.EDU_TRNNG_NM, '') AS EDU_TRNNG_NM , A.RECRUMT_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('RECRUMT_STS_CD', A.RECRUMT_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS RECRUMT_STS_NM , A.VIEW_CNT , A.BKMK_CNT , IFNULL(FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, #{condCateCd}, A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ), '') AS BKMK_SEQ , IFNULL(FN_GET_ADDR_NM_BY_EDU_TRNNG(A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ, #{langCd}), '') AS ADDR_NM , FN_GET_NEW_YN(A.REG_DT) AS NEW_YN , C.TEACHER_NM_1 , C.RECRUMT_MEMB , C.TEACH_DT , CONCAT(C.TEACH_BGN_HOUR, ':', C.TEACH_BGN_MINUTE, C.TEACH_BGN_AMPM) AS TEACH_BGN_TIME , CONCAT(C.TEACH_END_HOUR, ':', C.TEACH_END_MINUTE, C.TEACH_END_AMPM) AS TEACH_END_TIME FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON A.INSTT_SEQ = B.INSTT_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

/*eduTrnng.selectEduTrnngSoftSkill*/ SELECT A.INSTT_SEQ , A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ , IFNULL(A.EDU_TRNNG_NM, '') AS EDU_TRNNG_NM , A.ADDR_CD , FN_GET_ADDR_NM(SUBSTR(A.ADDR_CD,1,3), '2', #{langCd}) AS ADDR_NM , A.ADDR_DTL , A.ADDR_FULL_CD , A.ADDR_FULL_NM , A.NEA_EDU_DIV_CD AS TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('NEA_EDU_DIV_CD', A.NEA_EDU_DIV_CD, #{langCd}) AS TRNNG_NATNEXP_DIV_NM , A.ISCO_CD , FN_GET_ISCO_NM(ISCO_CD, #{langCd}) AS ISCO_NM , A.RECRUMT_STS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('RECRUMT_STS_CD', A.RECRUMT_STS_CD, #{langCd}) AS RECRUMT_STS_NM , FN_GET_REMAIN_CNT(A.RECURMT_END_DT) AS REMAIN_DT , FN_GET_REMAIN_DIV(A.RECURMT_END_DT) AS REMAIN_DIV , A.VIEW_CNT , A.BKMK_CNT , IFNULL(FN_GET_BKMK_SEQ(#{condUserSeq}, #{condCateCd}, A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ), '') AS BKMK_SEQ , A.EDU_TRNNG_KEYWORD , A.JC_AGREE_STS_CD , B.USER_SEQ , B.INSTT_OWNER_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('INSTT_OWNER_CD', B.INSTT_OWNER_CD, #{langCd}) AS INSTT_OWNER_NM , B.INSTT_TYPE_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('INSTT_TYPE_CD', B.INSTT_TYPE_CD, #{langCd}) AS INSTT_TYPE_NM , B.INSTT_ADDR_DTL , B.BKMK_CNT AS INSTT_BKMK_CNT , FN_GET_INSTT_NM(B.INSTT_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS INSTT_NM , B.INSTT_OFFICE_TEL , C.EDU_TRNNG_SUB_SEQ , C.TEACH_HOUR_WEEK , C.PROGRAM_CORS_TYPE_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('PC_TYPE_CD', C.PROGRAM_CORS_TYPE_CD, #{langCd}) AS PROGRAM_CORS_TYPE_NM , FN_GET_ISCED_NM(C.MAJOR_1DEPTH_CD, #{langCd}) AS MAJOR_DEPTH_NM_1 , FN_GET_ISCED_NM(C.MAJOR_2DEPTH_CD, #{langCd}) AS MAJOR_DEPTH_NM_2 , C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD', C.SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_CD, #{langCd}) AS SKILL_JOB_PROGRAM_CORS_NM , C.HIGH_GENRL_EDU_CORS_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('HIGH_GENRL_EDU_CORS_CD', C.HIGH_GENRL_EDU_CORS_CD, #{langCd}) AS HIGH_GENRL_EDU_CORS_NM , C.EDU_TARGET , C.ADMSS_CRITERIA , C.CONTENT , C.ENROL_METHOD , C.GOOGLE_MAP_LINK , C.RECRUMT_MEMB , A.MNGER_NM , A.MNGER_EMAIL AS EMAIL , A.MNGER_CELL AS CELL , C.CONTENT , C.MATR , C.AREA , C.CURRICL , C.FILE_GRP_SEQ , C.LECTURE_PHOTO_FILE_GRP_SEQ , FN_GET_FILE_PATH(C.TEACHER_1_PHOTO_FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS TEACHER_PHOTO_FILE_GRP_SEQ_1 , FN_GET_FILE_PATH(C.TEACHER_2_PHOTO_FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS TEACHER_PHOTO_FILE_GRP_SEQ_2 , C.TEACHER_1_CAREER AS TEACHER_CAREER_1 , C.TEACHER_2_CAREER AS TEACHER_CAREER_2 , C.TEACHER_NM_1 , C.TEACHER_NM_2
, FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_BGN_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_BGN_DT , FN_GET_BASE_DATE_CHAR(A.RECURMT_END_DT, #{langCd}) AS RECURMT_END_DT
, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(C.TEACH_DT, '%d/%m/%Y'), ' ', C.TEACH_BGN_HOUR,':',C.TEACH_BGN_MINUTE,' ',C.TEACH_BGN_AMPM) AS EDU_BGN_DT , CONCAT(C.TEACH_END_HOUR,':',C.TEACH_END_MINUTE,' ',C.TEACH_END_AMPM) AS EDU_END_DT , FN_GET_FILE_PATH(D.SAVE_FILE_PATH) AS LECTURE_PHOTO_PATH , D.SAVE_NM AS LECTURE_PHOTO_NM , D.ORIGINAL_NM AS LECTURE_PHOTO_ORG_NM
, FN_GET_FILE_PATH(E.SAVE_FILE_PATH) AS TEACHER_PHOTO_PATH_1 , E.SAVE_NM AS TEACHER_PHOTO_NM_1 , E.ORIGINAL_NM AS TEACHER_PHOTO_ORG_NM_1
, FN_GET_FILE_PATH(F.SAVE_FILE_PATH) AS TEACHER_PHOTO_PATH_2 , F.SAVE_NM AS TEACHER_PHOTO_NM_2 , F.ORIGINAL_NM AS TEACHER_PHOTO_ORG_NM_2 , G.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ AS USER_EDU_TRNNG_SEQ FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_INSTT B ON A.INSTT_SEQ = B.INSTT_SEQ INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_SUB C ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = C.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN CPES_ATTACH_FILES D ON C.LECTURE_PHOTO_FILE_GRP_SEQ = D.FILE_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN CPES_ATTACH_FILES E ON C.TEACHER_1_PHOTO_FILE_GRP_SEQ = E.FILE_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN CPES_ATTACH_FILES F ON C.TEACHER_2_PHOTO_FILE_GRP_SEQ = F.FILE_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT EDU_TRNNG_SEQ FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG_USER WHERE USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq}) G ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = G.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ WHERE A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = #{condSeq} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CPES_EDU_TRNNG A INNER JOIN CPES_EDU_TRNNG_USER B ON A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = B.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND B.USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq} AND A.EDU_TRNNG_SEQ = #{condSeq}
